thread.title: Ronald

author: Ronald
title: Ronald
text: I needed the 8 inch wheels for an unusual project. I bolted two together to make a 4 inch wide wheel and mounted it on a lathe and turned it down to a 3 degree angle for a rail cart wheel. I then added a flange to make the profile be close to a real train wheel. I made four of these and tested out this idea on a rail cart and the wheels worked perfectly. This was a very low cost way to get my project finished.
